price: Lut kaa sε: ”Nokorε sε woi nom yε mahͻhoͻ enti monhwε na moangu manim ase (wͻ wͻn anim).
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla inna hāulāi ḍayfī falā tafḍaḥūni
